name: Recycle My Life
description:
This is an unfinished game I started for the GDQ One Mechanic Game Jam 8. I didn't get to finish the ending or add some more rounds so after the first round it pretty much just ends lol... 

WARNING: There is a JUMPSCARE with one of the options in the game.

Recycle My Life, is a game where Kasanji comes back to the past from the future to get you to help save it. The future is on the brink of extinction because of mass pollution. It is up to you (if you choose to accept) to save the future from it's filthy demise by learning how to recycle and preserve out environment.

--- Learn about recycling by matching items to their appropriate bins

--- Clean up environments by picking up all the trash

--- Learn the things you can do to reduce your environmental footprint

--- Make decisions along the way that can ultimately change the future or your own

--- Help Kasanji re-use items to fix her portal and return to the future
